scoreSentence(Data, int) - Method in class kariminf.as.process.extraction.BayesClassifier
Scores a sentence The score is the probability that a sentence si represents all the topics cj ∈ C knowing a set of features F.
scoreSentInClass(Data, int, int) - Method in class kariminf.as.process.extraction.BayesClassifier
Calculates the score of a sentence in a class of topics The score of a sentence si in a class of topics cj having a set of features F is the production of scores of si in cj knowing each feature.
